name: SisterCities
description:
You are the mayor of two cities. They want to form one larger city together, however, neither city wants to be neglected in the meantime. You must manage both cities through skill and a healthy bit of luck until you successfully unite them.

Created for the Global Game Jam 2022 by Wayward Studios & Friends.

Music

Zoltán Majoros

Art

Elias Weisenborn

Code

Frederick Böhke, Harry Holliday, Lukas Leder
